wikipedia_page.main:
Shaun Rutherford (born 3 October 1996) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a defender for Cowdenbeath. Rutherford started his career with Livingston, and has also played for Queen of the South and Arbroath on loan.
Shaun currently is playing for tranent juniors.
